headline: Roche Gets Approval for Vabysmo PFS in EU for Three Retinal Diseases
summary: RHHBY wins approval for prefilled syringe of ophthalmology drug Vabysmo for three retinal conditions that can cause blindness.

raw.headline: Roche Gets Approval for Vabysmo PFS in EU for Three Retinal Diseases
raw.summary: RHHBY wins approval for prefilled syringe of ophthalmology drug Vabysmo for three retinal conditions that can cause blindness.

headline: Jefferies Upgrades Bristol Myers Squibb to ‘buy’ on drug Cobenfy
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies upgraded Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) to "buy" from "hold" and raised its price target by $7 to $70, amid an improved confidence in the company’s product pipeline, disciplined spending, and greater clarity on regulatory risks.
